ui_game_completed: Thanks for playing! You have completed the game!
level_hint_1_1: Slide to the side, my dear traveller.
level_hint_1_2: Every journey begins with a single motion.
level_hint_1_3: Stars are always waiting for you.
level_hint_1_4: Do you feel the cosmos moving with you?
level_hint_1_5: Relax… space bends to your touch.
level_hint_2_1: What you move, will move you in return.
level_hint_2_2: Even stars can be shifted with gentle force.
level_hint_2_4: What seems heavy may lead to freedom.
level_hint_2_5: Push the silence until it clears your path.
level_hint_3_1: Step in one, emerge in another — as if reborn.
level_hint_3_3: Doors of light are never truly closed.
level_hint_3_4: What is here… is also there.
level_hint_3_5: Travel beyond space, within a single step.
level_hint_4_1: Not all paths are straight in the cosmos.
level_hint_4_3: Your movement is only light seeking shape.
level_hint_4_4: The universe guides you, softly shifting course.
level_hint_4_5: Every redirection brings you closer to the center.
level_hint_5_2: You and your reflection dance together.
level_hint_5_3: Two planets move in sync, holding balance.
level_hint_5_4: Every step leaves a twin trace in the cosmos.
level_hint_5_5: When two move as one, harmony arises.
